text: Tomcat4-b1,b3 not correct work with Macromedia Ultradev4 under WEBDAV.
creator: serg_main@yahoo.com

text:
This is a known issue, which is very likely to be caused by a compliance issue 
in the Macromedia HTTP agent.

A workaround will be introduced (ie the HTTP/1.1 connector will check the user 
agent and downgrade itself to HTTP/1.0 if it recognizes the Macromedia HTTP 
agent), but in the meantime you should use the HTTP/1.0 connector.

Uncomment this section in the server.xml file (and change the port number if 
needed) :
    <Connector className="org.apache.catalina.connector.http10.HttpConnector"
               port="8082" minProcessors="5" maxProcessors="75"
               acceptCount="10" debug="0"/>
creator: remm@apache.org

text: Reopened bug to change assignee (should be Remy)
creator: pier@betaversion.org

text:
This bug is apparently some compliance issue with the Macromedia client, which
may have been fixed in a patch.
creator: remm@apache.org
